EmailTemplate.name: 10-27-22 Channel Partner Webinar Thank You Note.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the NCR Q3 Banking Partner Webcast
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Partners, I hope you were able to join NCR Q3 Banking Partner Webcast on October 20. We shared several topics to help drive your business, including marketing as a service, solution updates, ITM NextGen, roadmaps, and information on NCR’s company split and Program updates. If you missed the meeting, I encourage you to watch the replay <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCbR6TjM7MDWT8MQphCB84BFDDT3]]> and review the presentation <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCH3jbp96Hf39GWW2PdTddWcGcWP]]>. As always, please reach out to your Channel Account Manager with any questions. As customer needs shift and evolve, we’ll continue to pivot in a way that NCR’s Channel community can drive success and support our shared customers. Best regards, Robert Malik Global Banking Channel Sales Leader <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
